recipe.title: Molasses Ice Cream
instructions: Blend cream cheese, brown sugar, and molasses in a food processor or blender until smooth. With motor running, add half-and-half, blending until combined. Freeze in an ice cream maker, then transfer ice cream to an airtight container and put in freezer to harden.
Blend cream cheese, brown sugar, and molasses in a food processor or blender until smooth. With motor running, add half-and-half, blending until combined.
Freeze in an ice cream maker, then transfer ice cream to an airtight container and put in freezer to harden.
